abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
to advance in rank/promotion/advancement

sentences.english: He decides to direct a zombie film based on the Jin-Young's script.
sentences.chinese: 他決定直接基於晉年輕腳本的殭屍電影。

sentences.english: So the Jin troops used the path that they borrowed to attack Guo and they scored a decisive victory.
sentences.chinese: 晉大軍通過虞國道路，攻打虢國，很快就取得了勝利。

sentences.english: Jin merchant and Hui merchant are two business groups in Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 晉商與徽商是活躍於明清商界的兩大勁旅。

sentences.english: Jin is spreading the gospel of spending in China's evolving consumer culture.
sentences.chinese: 晉正在傳播着有中國文化的消費聖經。

sentences.english: Natural crossing and boll setting of a nucleo-cytoplasmic sterile line of cotton Jin-A were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了晉A棉花質核不育系的天然異交與成鈴。

sentences.english: Seeing that the Jin troops were retreating, the Chu troops thought that the enemy troops were afraid, and began chasing them.
sentences.chinese: 楚軍見晉軍後退，以爲對方害怕了，馬上追擊。

sentences.english: Shanxi belonged to Jin State in Spring and Autumn Period, so it is abbreviated in Jin.
sentences.chinese: 山西曾歸屬於春秋戰國時期的晉國，也因此簡稱爲晉。

sentences.english: An unexpected inheritance catapulted him into the ranks of the nouveaux riches.
sentences.chinese: 繼承了一筆意外的財產使他晉身爲暴發戶之列。

sentences.english: So Jigme Lingpa very strongly advised people to save the lives of animals.
sentences.chinese: 因此晉美林巴非常強烈地建議人們放生動物。

sentences.english: Duke Gong of Chu stood on a high platform built on chariot and watched the movements of the Jin army.
sentences.chinese: 楚共王站在架有高臺的戰車上觀察晉軍的動靜。

sentences.english: Shanxi province is briefly named as Jin, with Taiyuan as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 山西省，簡稱晉，省會城市是太原。

sentences.english: The contiguous area of Jin-Shan-Mong is one of the key areas in resources exploitation in China.
sentences.chinese: 晉陝蒙接壤區是我國資源重點開發區之一。

sentences.english: Still is made by the transportation to the path.
sentences.chinese: 至今仍是晉城東向交通往來的必經之路。

sentences.english: The first part is the first-floor exhibition hall in East Building, where the history of Jin State is shown;
sentences.chinese: 第一部分即東樓一層展廳爲晉國曆史展示部分。

sentences.english: Ninety percent of the Asian players managed to win the first round, but all lost the second.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲選手九成都晉十六強，但全與八強無緣。

to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
